markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Intuitive Cooperation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1014) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 44 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Access**
Jaric ethnicity

</column>

---

You are accustomed to working alongside others, relying on each other to get by. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75), and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Aid you.
name: Intuitive Cooperation
